alert.note: Alert for Bossier; Caddo (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 18 at 7:24AM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Hempstead, Lafayette, southern Nevada, southeastern Little River, Miller and western Columbia Counties, northwestern Caddo and northwestern Bossier Parishes, northeastern Marion, Bowie, east central Titus, Cass and Morris Counties through 800 AM CDT... At 724 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Ogden to Wake Village to near Redwater to 10 miles west of Maud to near Cookville. Movement was east at 80 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Texarkana, Magnolia, Atlanta, Wake Village, New Boston, Stamps, Waldo, Lewisville, McNeil, Vivian, Nash, Hooks, Daingerfield, Linden, Hughes Springs, Queen City, Naples, Redwater, Maud and Omaha. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
